translation.name: English
translation.title: Research Calc for Pokémon Sleep
translation.strength too low: Snorlax strength should be at least <strength/>.
translation.next strength to get 1 more pokemon: If you gain <strength2/> strength by the second sleep, you will encounter <count2/> Pokémon during the second sleep session (Only when the first sleep score is <score1/>).
translation.guaranteed score text: <pokemon/> will reliably appear with the next drowsy power in <area/>.
translation.guaranteed score info: These values are reported base on <x>proprietary research</x>, so there may be a possibility of inaccuracy.
translation.guaranteed score warning: These values may change due to future Pokémon additions and server-side configuration changes. Also, during events, the Pokémon won't appear as expected.
translation.not guaranteed because of update: After the release of version 1.4.0, the Pokémon aren't appearing as expected.
translation.notice:
Using this tool is easy!
Simply enter your Research Area and Snorlax strength.
You can know how many Pokémon will appear for each sleep score.
translation.notice detail1: While Good Sleep Day, don't forget to change the multiplier for the [$t(bonus)]!
translation.notice detail2: If you check [$t(sleep twice)], you can know the total number of Pokémon.
translation.pwa notice: Add 'Research Calc' to your home screen for fast access.
translation.how to add to home screen: How to Add to Home Screen
translation.push share icon: Press <share/> located at the bottom of the Safari. (If you cannot find the icon, close this popup and scroll upward)
translation.select add to home screen: Select [Add to Home Screen <add/>] from the menu.
translation.about1: This tool is an unofficial tool developed by <profile>nitoyon</profile>.
translation.about2: If you have bug reports or improvement suggestions, please contact X (twitter) <x>@nitoyon</x> or <github>GitHub repository</github>.
translation.about3: I am referring to the data from '<wiki>ポケモンスリープ攻略・検証Wiki</wiki>'.
